localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Runops is a command-line app that lets you query databases and manage servers using a single tool. It adds Git versioning, reviews in Slack, and sensitive data masking to every command you run from the terminal.
nodes.title: Runops - Run one-off scripts as production-ready automations
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Shoutout makes it incredibly easy to tap into your existing social proof and turn it into a beautiful "Wall of Love". Capture, curate, and publish a wall in less than 3 minutes ğŸ’¯
nodes.title: Shoutout - Attract more customers by highlighting why people trust you

nodes.excerpt: Wildcast is a patent-pending networking platform for those in the podcast industry to connect and podcast together! You can build a profile as a podcast or guest, browse others to connect with, add them to your network, and start collaborating.
nodes.title: Wildcast - Patent-pending podcast networking platform
nodes.author: Madison Catania

nodes.excerpt: Once we asked ourselves, 'Why are expense trackers so expensive?' We decided to correct this unfairness and ready to present to your attention the first completely free expense tracker.
nodes.title: Le Ruble â€“Â free expense tracker - Take control of your money

nodes.excerpt: Entry is a FaceID for desktops. It enables users to securely authenticate online using regular webcams with no compromise to privacy and security. Add Entry to your Single Sign-On provider as a factor and authenticate by face, just like on a mobile device.
nodes.title: Entry - Biometric Authentication Factor for SSO
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Use all your favorite web apps in Wavebox instead of Chrome and save 90 minutes per day by automating tasks and staying focused. Wavebox has everything you need to work faster across Slack, Asana, Trello, and every other app you use to get work done.
nodes.title: Wavebox - All your favorite web apps in Wavebox instead of Chrome
nodes.author: Kaan EmeÃ§

nodes.excerpt: Focus on the three most important tasks every day. To be really effective you have to pick up the three most significant tasks per day. A massive productivity improvement and considered by many experts to be the best to-do strategy. Look it up!
nodes.title: 3 Things - Focus on the 3 most important things today
nodes.author: Marta

nodes.excerpt: Auth. is a 2FA and OTP management tool for everyone. Works with all Apple personal devices - support handoff and keychain. Scan the QR Code and Done! Or you may add your account manually from your provider. Safari extension is also available for auto-fill-in.
nodes.title: auth. - 2FA , MFA, OTP, Secure Code for Apple devices
nodes.author: MING

nodes.excerpt: Teams by CALA is now available. With Teams, users can collaborate on the clothing design and manufacturing processes within one platform, eliminating siloed conversations among the sometimes 20+ specialists that work to bring fashion collections to life.
nodes.title: CALA - Teams - How fashion brands run their business.

nodes.excerpt: This is an iOS Clubhouse Bio Builder. You get 70 supported fonts, a large text box editor, it's stupid easy to understand, and most importantly it's FREE!
nodes.title: Clubhouse Bio Builder - Craft your bio and immediately get more followers

nodes.excerpt: Visualize your team's recurring tasks and processes in Slack. Build visual workflows using drag and drop interface and run the workflows to get a bird's eye view into your recurring processes. Sign up with Slack and run your first workflow in <1 min!
nodes.title: Finisher - Build visual streamlined workflows for your team in Slack

nodes.excerpt: Everything you need to achieve your fitness goals: prefilled workout databases that are filterable by equipment & fitness levels, exercise & nutrition logging, calendars, and more.
nodes.title: HomeFitness OS - The all-in-one fitness system for Notion

nodes.excerpt: TextBuddy is a Mac app for manipulating text. A Swiss Army knife for plain text that is there when you need it and hidden when you donâ€™t. Faster than your IDE. Easier than the command line. Transform and extract text from images and audio, too.
nodes.title: TextBuddy for macOS - A Swiss Army knife for plain text.

nodes.excerpt: HypeDocs is a web app that allows you to write down your accomplishments - personal or professional - throughout your day so they donâ€™t get lost or forgotten. Youâ€™ll get weekly reminders of past achievements, and can celebrate your wins with our community.

nodes.excerpt: Mirror iPhone/iPad to your Mac wirelessly. No need to connect iPhone/iPad to Mac with a cable. Demo what's on your iPhone/iPad in online meeting, play games, draw live. PhoneCast is a universal purchase app so you buy once and use it on iPhone, iPad and Mac.
nodes.title: PhoneCast - Mirror iPhone or iPad screen to Mac without wires

nodes.excerpt: Docsumo is a Document AI software that helps enterprises capture and analyse unstructured documents. Use prebuilt APIs to convert invoices bank statements, tax returns, ACORD forms & ID cards into JSON/CSV. Get accurate analytics for automated decisions.
nodes.title: Extract Tables by Docsumo - Free tool to extract tables from PDF and Images

nodes.excerpt: Share your images, not your secrets. Black Highlighter makes it easy to hide text you donâ€™t want to share in images youâ€™re going to share anyway. Hide peopleâ€™s names, e-mail addresses, and more with just a quick scribble.

nodes.excerpt: Text Compare lets you instantly see the difference between two pieces of text. Compare text by paragraph, word or character. Paste in two pieces of text, and Text Compare will highlight what has been inserted in, or deleted from, the original text.
